{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4244010,"totalDownVotes":776753,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":258236,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":620672,"totalDownVotes":47503,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":82286,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3783948,"totalDownVotes":311990,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":87434,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":910280,"totalDownVotes":57851,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE 50 + 2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":51577,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"UPDATE 50:

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":531518,"totalDownVotes":37349,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":48335,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":285734,"totalDownVotes":33130,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":26315,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2785495,"totalDownVotes":364820,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":34623,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Corre hacia la cima a través de un enorme arsenal de armas! Conquista el día en un juego arcade de ritmo rápido, desde bazucas hasta libros de hechizos, ¡cada arma te mantendrá adivinando lo que sigue! ¡Gana BattleBucks y engaña tu juego con un gran selección de personajes, refriegas, efectos de muerte, máscaras y más!


-Translation by "L_umin0us""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4363427,"totalDownVotes":590656,"universeId":245662005,"name":"🕵️‍♀️ LIMITED! Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":34045,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here!

⚽️ New Soccer Ball reward: Bonded Wheels!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1023719,"totalDownVotes":51603,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":28582,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

✨¡Estamos trabajando en más actualizaciones! 

💙 ¡Juega con millones de jugadores a MeepCity!"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3236456,"totalDownVotes":283850,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":45106,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2076717,"totalDownVotes":287356,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":37010,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼New Update 5/3! Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2145999,"totalDownVotes":660693,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":63257,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":145880,"totalDownVotes":8021,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":13442,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":230163,"totalDownVotes":20530,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":27142,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3100
There are 30 Physical Fruits In Game

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1191478,"totalDownVotes":68002,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":20202,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":699546,"totalDownVotes":94676,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":17985,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money
⚔️ Loot monsters and bosses
👨‍🍳 Cook tasty delicacies
🔥 And more!

Controls:
[E]: Open inventory

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":663190,"totalDownVotes":128607,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":10744,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Faça parte de uma luta de fogo baseada em equipes 5v5 em uma variedade de mapas espalhados pelo mundo.

Ganhe dinheiro no jogo eliminando inimigos e correndo atrás dos objetivos, que você pode usar para comprar novas armas, equipamentos e granadas no início de cada round."},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":189066,"totalDownVotes":31036,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":10893,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2330368,"totalDownVotes":244889,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":40379,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":7083660,"creatorName":"StealthWhale","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":45422,"totalDownVotes":4873,"universeId":2383988292,"name":"[10xHONEY] 🐝 Beeface: Be a Bee!","placeId":6410967163,"playerCount":30202,"imageToken":"T_6410967163_718b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"📢 WORLD 16 AT 55K LIKES!
📢 UPDATE: You can now buy 10x honey multiplier in "misc" section of shop!
📢 UPDATE: Co-op is here! Friends can now work on each other's plot!
📢 UPDATE: DIVINE BEE has appeared! World 14 is out! 🐮 You can now buy eggs and more bee slots! 

👍 LIKE IF YOU WANT MORE UPDATES!

FEATURES: 
🐝 Experience the busy life of a bee! 
🍯 Collect pollen, turn it into honey and expand your plot! 
🌸 Thousands of flowers await you! 
👑 Show your skills and become the Queen Bee!

Please join our group to stay tuned 🙂 https://www.roblox.com/groups/7083660/StealthWhale"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":912382,"totalDownVotes":118775,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🏆UPDATE + SALE🏆] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":10396,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1798529,"totalDownVotes":140449,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8005,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":517328,"totalDownVotes":42438,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":13088,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[AVISO: ESTE JUEGO ESTÁ EN BETA. ES NORMAL QUE HAYA ERRORES.]
En este mundo, nadie puede sobrevivir solo. ¡Haz un equipo con amigos para defender innumerables oleadas de zombis, pelear contra jefes, ganar monedas, subir de nivel, y comprar nuevas torres!  Si te sientes preparado para un desafío, intenta asumir jefes más duros en dificultades más difíciles

👥💵 ¡Únete al grupo para +100$ de dinero inicial! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍¡Pulgar hacia arriba y favorito para más actualizaciones de calidad!🌟

🛠️ACTUALIZACIONES🛠️
+ ELECTROCUTADOR ⚡ 
+ LAS ALTURAS [MAPA] 
+ FURIA DEL REY CAÍDO 😡 
+ Mostrador de Estadísticas de las Torres 📊 
+ ¡Errores arreglados! 🛠️

Lee el registro de actualización completo: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log

Créditos:
Propietario/Desarrollador Líder: BelowNatural
Scripter: Razuatix
Constructores: BiscuitTurtleKid & Beefchoplets
Compositor Musical: Phoqus"},{"creatorId":3732983,"creatorName":"polandgamebuilders","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":66328,"totalDownVotes":13313,"universeId":943733974,"name":"🎉Bit Event 2🎉   Bitcoin Miner [Beta]","placeId":2629642516,"playerCount":8699,"imageToken":"T_2629642516_7060","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Bitcoin Miner, in this game you can mine bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, upgrade new cards, buy new mining devices and many other.


🚧Game still under construction so expect new Updates soon.


💡New game updates coming soon!
- ❗ Quest Sytem Rework!
- 💱 Exchanger revamp!



📕update log 📕
- 🎉 Bit Event 2!
- 🖥️ New Change Card Ui!
- 🌿 New Decorations
- 🔊 Some Sound effects!
- ⚙️ Bug Fixes!


Note: This is just a simulation, all cryptocurrencies are ONLY in-game items, NOT connected to real world ones
